verbose_text: Since etamsylate binds FGF and in this way interferes with the binding of FGF to its receptor, cells treated with etamsylate show a decreased phosphorylation of Akt and MAPK Erk1/2, in a dose dependent manner, interfering in this way with the signaling cascades of both, VEGF and FGF.
evidence: phosphorylation of Akt and MAPK Erk1/2
